channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Solving the Mystery of an Investment That's Too Good to Be True
item.description: Chasing the promise of a 17.1% return reveals nonexistent companies, illusory returns and unlicensed salespeople making absurd claims.

item.title: I’m 54 and have terminal cancer. I have a wife, 47, and 8-year-old child. How do I split my $1.2 million retirement and life insurance between them?
item.description: “In short, who should get the retirement accounts and who should get the life insurance?”

item.title: Is Your Bag Luxurious Enough for a Government Lawsuit?
item.description: The Coach and Michael Kors case shows the limits of antitrust challenges.

item.title: ‘Powell delivered the stock market to the Promised Land.’ Why the S&P 500 could soar past 6,000 by year-end.
item.description: Yardeni: Odds of a 1990s-like market boom have increased after Fed rate-cut.

item.title: Annuities' New Golden Age Probably Isn't Over Yet
item.description: High rates have helped annuity sales, but so have other forces.

item.title: Trump Media & Technology Group’s stock hits low as insider stock-sale ban lifts
item.description: Trump Media & Technology Group Corp.’s stock dropped to its lowest level since it went public in March Friday, as a ban on stock sales lifted.

item.title: On-the-Move Americans Are Unwitting Storm Chasers
item.description: As more people relocate to states exposed to natural disasters, the property investors following them are assuming bigger risks.

item.title: Four things you need to know about Medicare drug costs and coverage in 2025
item.description: With Medicare prescription-drug benefits on the brink of a shake-up, enrollees who hope to minimize their costs at the pharmacy counter next year need...

item.title: How Five Wall Street Investors Will Trade Falling Interest Rates
item.description: The world of 5% yields is ending.

item.title: Traders face biggest index rebalancing in four years on Friday: Here’s what to watch for
item.description: Investors are facing the busiest quarterly rebalancing in about four years on Friday in a shakeup that could impact roughly $250 billion worth of stoc...
